Section.name: About AJIET
Section.description:
AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology was established in the year 1991. The Institute offers BE and PhD courses in 5 streams. The admission to the courses is based on the KCET entrance exam. The application mode is online.
The institute offers promising placement opportunities with the highest salary package of INR 14 LPA. The top recruiters include Infosys, TCS, Wipro, Microsoft, etc.
AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology offers the BE courses specialized in 5 sections. The Institute also offers Ph. D courses in 3 specialization Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics. There are a total number of 10 departments available in the Institute.
Read More: AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology Fee Structure
The admission is based on both entrance and merit. Candidates can apply online.
Read More: AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology Cutoff
The institute offers great placement opportunities on campus. In 2019-20 placement the highest salary package offered was INR 14 LPA. Department wise placement details are as follows:
Read More: AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology Placement

Ques. What all documents are required for admission in AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology?
Ans. Following documents are required for admission:
Ques. Does the AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology have workshops and training programs?
Ans. AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology has a central workshop for practical training purposes. The Institute arranges other training programs for students skill improvisation.
Ques. Do the AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology anti-ragging committee on campus?
Ans. AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology has an anti-ragging committee on campus. Dr Rajesh Rai P.is the Chairman of the Anti-Ragging Committee.
Ques. Does AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology offer an E-learning service?
Ans. AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology has an E-learning facility available. The Institute has a YouTube channel and virtual labs.
Ques. Does the AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology have a minority facility?
Ans. AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology has a minority reservation system as per govt order. Also, the Institute has an SC/ ST cell.
Ques. How is the faculty of AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology?
Ans. AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology has approximately 150 faculty members available. The principal of the institute is, Dr Shanthrama Rai C. He is a BE, M.Tech, PhD, MISTE, MISLE, MIEEE. Each engineering department including the basic science department has a HOD.
Read More: AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology Faculty

Specializations: Civil Engineering, Computer Science And Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Information Science & Engineering, Mechanical Engineering
			Duration: 4 Years
			Eligibility: 10+2 with 45% (40% for SC/ ST) in Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry/ bio-technology/ computer science/ Biology/ electronic as optional with English or any other language subject
			Selection Criteria: Entrance Based (KCET)

faqs.question: What all documents are required for admission in AJ Institute of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Ans.Following documents are required for admission:10th and 12th marksheet - Original + 3 attested photocopies each.Transfer Certificate Original + 3 attested photocopies.Migration Certificate Original + 2 photocopies.Conduct Certificate from the institution last attended.Medical Certificate which mentions blood groups.10 Passport Size Photographs with red backgroundCaste and Income CertificateStudy Certificate for CET students.CET/ Equivalent Rank Card
